content: with just one ball of knitpal cotton to the core worsted yarn you can make my love this hat in any of the 8 included sizes this easy to crochet hat pattern is worked from the bottom to the top in one piece the main hat stitch pattern is created with half_double_crochet half_double_crochet cluster stitches this textured beanie can be crocheted in just a few hours > this pattern is available for free on > my blog which is monetized by ads if > you prefer an ad-free version of the > pattern it is available to purchase > right here on ravelry ♥ rhondda instagram https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ instagram reels https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/reels/ tiktok https //www tiktok com/@oombawkadesigncrochet pinterest https //www pinterest com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ youtube https //www youtube com/oombawkadesigncrochet facebook https //www facebook com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ newsletter https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/crochet-newsletter © 2012-2023 designed by rhondda mol oombawka design crochet all rights reserved you may sell finished items you crochet from this pattern no part of this publication may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from rhondda mol
